settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyHelp: This key is stored only on your device and is used to generate faster AI answers.
settings.aiHelpBody: AI answer generation will be very slow on most local computers. Add an OpenAI API key to receive results within seconds.
settings.ollamaDescription: Run Ollama with the llama3:8b model to keep AI answers fully offline.
settings.ollamaToggle: Enable local Ollama for AI answers
ollamaSteps: Install from https://ollama.ai and keep `ollama serve` running.
Download the model once: `ollama pull llama3:8b`.
Open this app only after Ollama is up and the model is loaded.
settings.ollamaHelpOverview: Ollama is a free tool that lets you run AI models locally on your computer. This means you can generate AI answers without an internet connection or API key. It requires a one-time installation and downloads AI models (around 4-5GB) to your machine.
settings.ollamaHelpWindowsStep1: Download the Windows installer from https://ollama.ai/download
settings.ollamaHelpWindowsStep2: Run the installer and follow the setup wizard
settings.ollamaHelpWindowsStep3: Open Command Prompt (cmd) or PowerShell and download the AI model:
settings.ollamaHelpWindowsStep4: Ollama will automatically start in the background. You're all set!
settings.ollamaHelpMacStep1: Download the Mac installer from https://ollama.ai/download
settings.ollamaHelpMacStep2: Open the .dmg file and drag Ollama to your Applications folder
settings.ollamaHelpMacStep3: Open Terminal and download the AI model:
settings.ollamaHelpMacStep4: Ollama will run automatically. You can see the icon in your menu bar.
settings.ollamaHelpConnectionTitle: How Does This App Connect to Ollama?
settings.ollamaHelpConnection: Once Ollama is installed and running, this app automatically connects to it using your computer's local network (localhost:11434). When you enable the Ollama toggle in Settings and check "Generate AI Answer", the app sends your question to Ollama running on your machine, which generates an answer based on the search results.
settings.ollamaHelpConnectionNote: No data leaves your computer when using Ollama
settings.ollamaHelpTroubleshooting1: If AI generation fails, make sure Ollama is running (check system tray on Windows or menu bar on Mac)
settings.ollamaHelpTroubleshooting2: Verify the model is downloaded: run 'ollama list' in terminal to see installed models
settings.ollamaHelpTroubleshooting3: First-time generation may be slower while the model loads into memory
